org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation

Class EvaluationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation.EvaluationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvaluationResult, PipelineResult
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamingEvaluationContext

    public class EvaluationContext
extends Object
implements EvaluationResult
    Evaluation context allows us to define how pipeline instructions.

      void close()
      Releases any runtime resources, including distributed-execution contexts currently held by this EvaluationResult; once close() has been called, EvaluationResult.get(PCollection) might not work for subsequent calls.

      • computeOutputs

        public void computeOutputs()
        Computes the outputs for all RDDs that are leaves in the DAG and do not have any actions (like saving to a file) registered on them (i.e. they are performed for side effects).
